action.name: Eat a grilled chicken
action.event: Manfred grills up a chicken and devours it.

action.name: Drink a protein shake
action.event: Manfred blends up a protein shake and drinks it. Tastes like strawberries

action.name: Sleep for 8 hours
action.event: Manfred goes to bed for a few hours.

action.name: Take a 20 minute nap
action.event: Manfred takes a quick snooze.

action.name: Do 100 pushups
action.event: Manfred does a hundred pushups.

action.name: Run a mile
action.event: Manfred jogs a mile.

action.name: Run a Marathon
action.event: Manfred heads to the park for his annual marathon. Halfway through the third mile, Manfred hears screams from across the park. Riots are breaking out in protest of the new Prime Minister. Manfred flees from all the chaos and runs straight home.

action.name: Eat some fried chicken
action.event: Manfred eats some delicious fried chicken.

action.name: Drink a milkshake
action.event: Manfred downs a creamy strawberry milkshake.

action.name: Warm up the couch
action.event: Manfred gets comfortable in his chair.

action.name: Grab the laptop
action.event: Manfred opens up his laptop and browses some forums.

action.name: Walk to the BBQ Festival
action.event: Manfred heads to the park for the annual barbecue festival. Right as he digs into his plate, screams break out from across the park. Riots have begun in protest of the new Prime Minister. In fear that the rioters will crash the festival, Manfred devours as much barbecue as he can.

action.name: Eat a lean steak
action.event: Manfred puts a lean steak in the oven for a few minutes. He cooks it rare and eats it slowly.

action.name: Eat a head of lettuce
action.event: Manfred grabs a head of lettuce from the fridge and eats it like a cookie.

action.name: Run some sprints
action.event: Manfred sprints up and down his driveway over a hundred times.

action.name: Go to the gym
action.event: Manfred walks over to the neighborhood gym for a pump.

action.name: Go buy a home gym
action.event: Manfred decides to save some money and buy his own home gym. While Manfred browses the selection of power racks, a loud explosion is heard from the front of the store. Screams and shouts are heard all around. War has broken out. Manfred, in a fit of emotions, grabs everything he can carry and runs home to shelter the storm.

action.name: Eat a Big Mac
action.event: Manfred goes to a McDonald's drive-thru and eats nearly fifty Big Macs.

action.name: Eat a dozen donuts
action.event: Manfred orders a baker's dozen of Texas-sized donuts and eats them with a fork and knife.

action.name: Do nothing
action.event: Manfred masters the art of meditation by laying dormant in the sofa.

action.name: Watch Television
action.event: Manfred kicks up the recliner and watches some local news. There seems to be a lot of civil unrest.

action.name: Go buy a pork butt
action.event: Manfred, after watching some Food Network, has a hankering for some pork butt. He heads to the local store, where he immediately encounters an angry citizen setting off an explosive device. Manfred dives for cover in the frozen foods section. War has officially broken out in the country. Manfred grabs as much food as he can and runs for home, but only lasts a few minutes before he gets tired and stops by a local homeless shelter.

action.name: Eat a box of broccoli
action.event: Manfred opens up a box of broccoli from the basement and eats each floret like it's his last.

action.name: Take some creatine
action.event: Manfred puts some creatine in his water in hopes of beefing up.

action.name: Flip a tire
action.event: Manfred heads to the backyard to flip some tractor tires. They're heavy!

action.name: Do the Russian squat routine
action.event: Manfred tackles the rack for six weeks of grueling, high-intensity squats.

action.name: Build an armory
action.event: Manfred, tired of hiding in his home, decides to plan his own attack. He hears of a local revolutionary group hoping to take control of the war and bring peace. Manfred wants to end the war on his own terms. He builds a small armory in his garage and trains to assassinate the revolutionary leader.

action.name: Eat some Spam
action.event: Manfred conjures up a can of Spam and fries it up into crispy oily goodness.

action.name: Eat that pork butt
action.event: Manfred tears off a piece of the pork butt he salvaged from the store and munches on it.

action.name: Do a squat
action.event: Manfred squats down. He falls backward.

action.name: Build a chair
action.event: Manfred flips over a nearby box. A stranger comes and sits on it; they have a delightful conversation.

action.name: Join the Revolutionaries
action.event: Manfred, having become the center of gossip amongst the homeless shelter, decides to take leadership to end the war. He rounds up a group of revolutionaries, and speaks of a day where peace takes over the country and they can rebuild their lives into something better.

action.name: Eat some crickets
action.event: Manfred digs up a bunch of crickets from the yard for lunch. Protein!

action.name: Drink a vegetable drink
action.event: Manfred cracks open a jar of vegetable powder and makes an interesting drink.

action.name: Flip a car
action.event: Manfred heads to the front yard and flips over his car. It's heavy!

action.name: Crush some steel
action.event: Manfred finds a steel bar and rolls it up with his bare hands.

action.name: Assassinate the Revolutionary Leader
action.event: TO BE CONTINUED...

action.name: Eat a very old Big Mac
action.event: Manfred finds a box of old uneaten Big Macs in the trash. They look like they've been sitting for years.

action.name: Eat some Crisco soup
action.event: Manfred and his friends heat up a big jar of Crisco into a delicious soup.

action.name: Do vocal exercises
action.event: Manfred practices some vocal exercises in preparation for a big speech.

action.name: Hibernate
action.event: Manfred hibernates for the winter.

action.name: Give a War-Ending Speech
action.event: TO BE CONTINUED...
